participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Open-minded and caring, enjoys sharing experiences with multiple partners.
participant_1.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. my father was a door to door salesman. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Bob
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and sociable, loves spending time outdoors and enjoys simple pleasures.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.

content.text: hello. how are you doing today?
what do you do on your time off from work? do you have pets?
